title: Left & Right Unite for DC Anti-Vax Mandate Rally
itunes:title: Left & Right Unite for DC Anti-Vax Mandate Rally
description:
Last weekend witnessed a rare coming together of those on the left and the right, united in opposition to vaccine mandates. Jimmy and comedian The Greyzone's Max Blumenthal discuss the event and Max delivers the speech he had hoped to make at the rally but couldn't.

Plus segments on Whoopi Goldberg's attacks on Bill Maher over COVID restrictions and news that the UK and Ireland will soon be lifting those restrictions.

Also featuring Stef Zamorano, Kurt Metzger and Mike MacRae! And phone calls from Vladimir Putin and George Clooney!
